tool.name: parse mykrobe predict
tool.description: Parses Mykrobe predict results for Shigella sonnei.
tool.command:
parse_mykrobe_predict --jsons
#for $i in $json #if $i "$i" #end if #end for
#if $optional.alleles: --alleles '$optional.alleles' #end if
--prefix results

param.name: json
param.label: The Mykrobe results to parse.
param.help: The Mykrobe results, in JSON format, to parse. This input is mandatory.

param.name: alleles
param.label: Alleles
param.help: Links each lineage name to its human-readable counterpart. This parameter is optional.

tool.help:
Parse Mykrobe Predict =====================
Parses Mykrobe predict results for Shigella sonnei. Please refer to the GitHub repository (https://github.com/katholt/sonneityping) for more information.
